name: Reptech basic ship blueprint package
desc: Enables the use and build of the advanced ships. These can take a lot of punishment and can easily destroy hostile ships.

name: Reptech advanced ship blueprint package
desc: Allows for the use and build of advanced reptech ships. These can defeat many powerful ships if used correctly.

name: Reptech elite ship blueprint package
desc: The most powerful reptech ship blueprints resides in here. Such power may drive the user crazy. Please use with caution.
